instructions:
Parboil corned beef 2 1/2 hours. Place on baking rack fat side up and spread mixture of mustard and
brown sugar on both sides of meat. Baste with ginger ale. Add ¼ inch water in bottom of roasting pan and
roast in 350-degree oven for 3/4 to 1 hour. Cool before slicing.
name: Corned Beef Oven Glazed
